typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as integer,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as date,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgAirport
StgAirport derive(C_ID = 1,
		{EFF STRT DT} = '2015-01-01',
		{EFF END DT} = '2500-12-31',
		{ACTV IND} = 'Y') ~> ConstantColumn
ConstantColumn window(over(C_ID),
	asc(C_ID, true),
	ARPT_ID = rowNumber()) ~> AddRowNumber
AddRowNumber sink(input(
		ARPT_ID as integer,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_LAT as decimal(8,6),
		ARPT_LONG as decimal(9,6),
		ARPT_ALTD as decimal(6,2),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as decimal(2,2),
		ARPT_DST_CD as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		EFF_STRT_DT as timestamp,
		EFF_END_DT as timestamp,
		ACTV_IND as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ARPT_ID,
		ARPT_IATA_CD,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD,
		ARPT_NAME,
		ARPT_CNTRY,
		ARPT_CITY,
		ARPT_LAT,
		ARPT_LONG,
		ARPT_ALTD,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET,
		ARPT_DST_CD = ARPT_DST,
		ARPT_TZONE,
		EFF_STRT_DT = {EFF STRT DT},
		EFF_END_DT = {EFF END DT},
		ACTV_IND = {ACTV IND}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> APRT
